overview: S. Sriram an internet entrepreneur who previously founded pop2it (wayback, a contextual ecommerce platform for etailers and website publishers, during the dot-com heyday. Subsequent to which he performed due diligence on a few portfolio companies of doteduventures and played entrepreneur-in-residence at the Internet Archive. His last university stop was doing the Executive Program for Growing Companies at Stanfordâ€™s Graduate School of Business. Prior to his coming to California, he bootstrapped a technology consulting company that targeted Wall Street firms based on his risk management work at Salomon Bros.
